author: Avery Hartmans
title: Tech companies like Apple and Blue Origin and universities like Duke are using their arsenals of 3D printers to produce millions of face shields for medical workers (AAPL, HP, F)
description: The nation's arsenal of 3D printers is being deployed to produce protective equipment amid the coronavirus outbreak. Universities like Duke, Harvard, and Northwestern are using their 3D-printing facilities to produce up to 1,000 face-shield components per day…
content:
The nation's stockpile of 3D printers is being corralled in the fight against the coronavirus pandemic. 
Nearly 600,000 people in the United States have been infected with the virus, and as it continues to spread across the US, it's highlighted shortages of … [+1837 chars]
